main event: A sighting of a UFO was reported in Seaford, Long Island, NY on 28 September 1958, involving two unidentified objects, one described with a red-blue flame.
interesting points: The first object resembled a blanket with red-blue flames and disappeared instantly to the East., The second object was white, appeared to have speed trails, and was the size of a dime., The sighting lasted approximately 1.5 seconds., The witness noted unusual capabilities for the objects regarding speed and maneuverability., The sighting occurred on a clear night, and the witness was prompted to look up due to a sound.
sighted object: one object resembling a blanket with red-blue flame and another white object with speed trails
location: Seaford, Long Island, New York, USA
witness description: Truck driver from Seaford, Long Island, NY
